links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,500
R. Knott, Mathematics of the Fibonacci Series
mathematica: Union[ Table[ Fibonacci[i] - 1, {i, 1, 30} ], Table[ Fibonacci[j] + 1, {j, 0, 30} ]]Union[Flatten[#+{1,-1}&/@Fibonacci[Range[30]]]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 26 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) { t="b061489.txt"; for (n=1, 4, write(t, n, " ", n - 1) ); g=3; h=2; for (n=3, 250, f=g + h; h=g; g=f; write(t, 2*n - 1, " ", f - 1); write(t, 2*n, " ", f + 1) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 23 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 08 2001
